testcase.name: User is on the Course Page and able toSubscription for a Course
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Unacademy Course Page..................................passed When User clicks on a particular Course.....................................passed Then Get Subscription Tab is displayed and clicking on it duration of the course is also displayed.passed

testcase.name: User now selects the Course Plan with Discount
testcase.system-out: Given User is now on Course Duration Page...................................passed When User clicks on different Course Plan...................................passed And User Enters & Apply the Referral Code...................................passed Then User click to procees to payment.......................................passed

testcase.name: User Verifying Mobile Number and Different Payment Options
testcase.system-out: Given User is Redirected to Payment Page....................................passed When User Enters the Mobile Number 7979079958...............................passed And User clicks login button................................................passed And User Verify the OTP.....................................................passed And User verify the Different Payment Options...............................passed Then Close the Browser......................................................passed
